title: MythicMobs的问题,望大佬解决
author: MC_Shenfeng
txt_content:
服务器版本为1.11
用的是mm4.3.2
服务器会生成无法被攻击的怪(看得见,血条显示0,会攻击,但是人打他像打空气)
用mm mobs killall可以除去

以下为服务器后台报错

[18:19:17] [Craft Scheduler Thread - 274/WARN]: [MythicMobs] Plugin MythicMobs v4.3.2-SNAPSHOT generated an exception while executing task 436
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Progress must be between 0.0 and 1.0 (NaN)
        at com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkArgument(Preconditions.java:148) ~[spigot-1.11.2.jar:git-Spigot-7d78b81-50acb44]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.boss.CraftBossBar.setProgress(CraftBossBar.java:123) ~[spigot-1.11.2.jar:git-Spigot-7d78b81-50acb44]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.adapters.bukkit.BukkitBossBar.setProgress(BukkitBossBar.java:74) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.mobs.ActiveMob.updateBossBar(ActiveMob.java:443) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.mobs.ActiveMob.tick(ActiveMob.java:119) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.AbstractSkill.RunTimerSkills(AbstractSkill.java:295) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.clock.MythicMobsAsyncClock.run(MythicMobsAsyncClock.java:19) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:71) ~[spigot-1.11.2.jar:git-Spigot-7d78b81-50acb44]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_11_R1.scheduler.CraftAsyncTask.run(CraftAsyncTask.java:52) [spigot-1.11.2.jar:git-Spigot-7d78b81-50acb44]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_141]
        at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_141]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_141] 


希望大佬解答
本人QQ:3214433094
